name: P1 - 5NT
description:
Welcome aboard the P1 - 5NT Spacecraft. On your journey you will be tasked with helping us care for the extraterrestrial life samples from the planets we pass by. In other words, you gotta keep these weird space plants alive. The tricky part about that is we have no clue what these things even need to survive. That is where you come in. You gotta try and figure out what each of these plants need without killing too many of them.

Includes 2 different ways to play

As a plant researcher trying to discover what each type of plant needs to survive

As a plant caretaker that has to supply each plant with the right materials before time runs out.

This game was made in 72 hours as a part of LD46 with the theme "Keep it Alive."
